common.controllers

Class SunriseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • io.sphere.sdk.play.controllers.ShopController
          • common.controllers.SunriseController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public abstract class SunriseController
extends ShopController
    An application specific controller.
